| History                 = {{Quote|Ha ha, okay. Here's the thing with '''cops''' [[Earth-616|here]]. They are just another '''plot''' device to further the existence of '''super heroes.''' I'm from a [[Earth-TRN565|world]] without super heroes. I '''know''' how cops are '''supposed''' to be, okay? If you had a halfway competent [[Central Intelligence Agency (Earth-616)|C.I.A.]], you wouldn't need [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]]. If your [[United States Army (Earth-616)|military]] could fight the '''[[Skrull Empire|Skrulls]],''' you wouldn't need '''the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]].''' And if your '''joke cops''' could stop a '''single bank robbery,''' then you wouldn't need '''[[Peter Parker (Earth-616)|Spider-Man]].''' Your world '''never''' needed the police.|[[Gwendolyn Poole (Earth-TRN565)|Gwenpool]]|Unbelievable Gwenpool Vol 1 8}}

The New York City Police Department is a police organization that guards New York City from various criminal elements, both regular and superhuman.

==Members==
{{Main|New York City Police Department (Earth-616)/Members}}
{{Seealso|:Category:New York City Police Department members}}
| Equipment               = 
| Transportation          = Police Cruisers
| Weapons                 = Various police firearms
| Notes                   = 
* The NYPD has used Code Six-Oh-Six as an informal code for a crime where a superhuman is present on the scene and also referred to this as a 'Super Sixer'. These codes weren't covered at the Police Academy and were a reference to [[Earth-616]], the world in which most Marvel comics are based.{{r|Code of Honor Vol 1 1}}
